title: need help training a neural network for semantic similiarity of issue tickets
content:
I have many jira tickets with input keys and summaries and other fields.

How to find similiar semantic tickets for a new input jira ticket . Should I use siamese neural network. Pls also give me advice how to train the network and use propogations.

Current

1.Find embedding of all tickets.

2.Get ticket fields of input ticket

3.Feed it into a transformer get embedding of input ticket

4.Use the scikit\_learn function cosine\_similarity compare embedding of input ticket summary and other ticket embeddings

5..Find the duplicate ticket for the new input ticket as the ticket with highest similiarity score.

6.I have used a pretrained transformer all-mpnet base v2 .It has worked somewhat.

​

I'm looking to improve the performance of the model by using another model and combining to create a novel approach.

I was thinking of using CNN or a siamese network

Any advice.

I will give more details if you want.

comments.body:
Firstly, don't share your number publicly on the internet. There are lots of creeps around. 

Secondly, you can learn more effective representations if you can perform domain adaptation. DM me, I'll provide some pointers.
